titles.title: Lytton Rancheria Homelands Act of 2015
To take lands in Sonoma County, California, into trust as part of the reservation of the Lytton Rancheria of California, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
5/21/2015--Introduced. Lytton Rancheria Homelands Act of 2015
This bill takes into trust for the benefit of the Lytton Rancheria of California (the Tribe), subject to valid existing rights, contracts, and management agreements related to easements and rights-of-way, certain land owned by the Tribe which is generally depicted on the map entitled "Lytton Fee Owned Property to be Taken into Trust," dated May 1, 2015.
Lands taken into trust shall become part of the Tribe's reservation.
Gaming is prohibited on such land.
